page.title: 12A Sheldon Housewife's Day
page.content: 06.45 Alarm rings. Children wake.Get up 07.00 Coffee.Make lunches. Goodbye Dad. 07.15 Get children dressed.Change nappy on baby.Breakfast - muesli, Ready Brek. 08.15 Beds made.Prepare flasks&biscuits 08.30 Wash dishes-check childrens faces 08.35 Off to school clean and polished. 09.00 Children safe in their schools. 09.10 To shops for meat & veg for pie. 09.20 Clothes&nappies to wash by hand. 10.00 Driving lessons-hope I pass soon 11.00 Back home- change baby's nappy. 11.15 Prepare evening meal.Peel potatoe 11.45 Iron clothes.Basket full- boring. 12.45 Play with baby in garden- peacefu 14.00 Bake 48 cakes- go like lightning 15.00 Buggy out-Off to school.Buy Mail. 15.35 Robin out-Meet Colette up the rd. 16.10 Meal cooking-Husband home-T.V. on 17.00 Wash up-books out-help ch. read. 20.00 Two in bed - Quiet. 21.00 Baby in cot - End of day - Relax.
